content.description: Start matched on the corner sloper, traverse the lip around to the ridge, and top out.
content.location: This is on the south end of the boulder.

content.description: Sit start below the thin seam on the NE corner of the boulder. Move into the seam at the only place to fit a couple fingers in. Jam, lock, and go for the top.
content.location: This ascends the NE corner of the Krusty Krab Boulder.

content.description: Very low sit start with left and right hands on two low side pulls about a foot and a half apart. Move up to a left hand crimp knob and a left hand in the flat slot and fire right to a half-pad crimp and grab a left side pull and move up and top out. V4 from the higher start with crimp knob and slot, which will make more sense for a taller climber.
content.location: This ascends the steep arête on the backside.

content.description: Cold Blooded Right shares the same very low sit start off the two sidepulls about a foot and a half apart as the problem Cold Blooded Direct. Move right to a flat, black sloper, then up to match on a crimp bar, then left to another match on a higher crimp bar, and then to a left sidepull and top out as for the problem Cold Blooded Direct.
content.location: This starts the same as the problem Cold Blooded Direct.

content.description: Krusty Krab is a really nice boulder with at least 8 problems on it. It is worth the hike.
